body.name: ALLKELR Portable Flat Water Bottle, BPA Free Tritan Plastic Travel Water Bottle for Camping, Fitness, Outdoor Sports, Fits Purse and Pocket (White, 12 oz)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 4 hrs 9 mins
features: UNIQUE EXTERIOR DESIGN: Oval flat water bottles design, perfectly fits the curve of the hand, prevents the water bottle from slipping.

HEALTHY & HIGH QUALITY : The travel water bottle made of high-quality Tritan Plastic, 100% recyclable material, BPA-free, odorless, maintains the natural taste of water, and is more environmentally friendly
COMFORTABLE USING EXPERIENCE: The narrow mouth design is easier to drink, and it is neat, easy to carry, and easy to clean at the end of the day!

SAFE ON-THE-GO:Portable integrated lid handle with threaded cap and washer for easy tightening and safe leak proof. The mini water bottle is easy to carry in a small purse as a memo water bottle and carry it around
POWERFUL DURABILITY:Tritan material is characterized by good toughness and hydrolytic stability, so this sports water bottle is durable and will not be damaged even when dropped
body.description: This oval flat water bottle is made of high-quality Tritan material and does not contain BPA. The bottle body is transparent, the unique mini mug shape of the bottle cap, and the built-in food-grade leak-proof silicone ring, their combination makes the water bottle more simple and fashionable. At the same time, its oval flat design makes this travel water bottle fit perfectly in your hand. Whether it's camping, fitness, or office, it becomes a memo water bottle to carry around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compast water bottle, no leaks, unique size and shape
reviews.reviewText: This is my new favorite water bottle. It looks nice, holds 10-12 ounces, seals well (no leaks), and is sized such that I can slip it into my back pants pocket (most of the time, if they are somewhat roomy) or in a large coat or vest pocket. I take regular 1-2mile hikes, and was sick of carrying around water bottles holding twice as much water as I drink. This works perfectly, no excess weight and easy to pocket. I will also use backpacking for an easy access water bottle.One downside is that it looks like a flask, so people keep thinking I'm drinking alcohol, but not a big deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute and perfect
reviews.reviewText: This is cute and perfect for my small purse. A wonderful way to stay hydrated when you're out and about running errands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought for travel
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Sleek and stylish: The flat design definitely stands out and fits easily in bags or pockets. Plus, the oval shape feels comfortable to hold.Durable: The high-quality plastic feels sturdy and hasn't shown any signs of wear and tear yet.Leakproof: The lid seems to do a good job of keeping things sealed, no accidental spills in my backpack!Cons:Detachable lid: This was my biggest gripe. While I appreciate the easy cleaning, the separate lid feels like a potential disaster waiting to happen. I've already had a few close calls of losing it, and it adds an extra step every time I want to drink. A tethered lid or built-in straw would be a major improvement.Narrow mouth: The opening is a bit small for my taste, making it slow to drink from and hard to fit ice cubes in. A wider mouth would be more convenient.Overall:The ALLKELR is a decent bottle with a cool design, but the detachable lid and narrow mouth kept it from being a true winner for me. If you're looking for a stylish and leakproof option, it's worth a try, but I'd definitely recommend keeping an eye on that lid!3 out of 5 stars - Potential, but needs some work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I rate this water bottle 5 stars.It came packaged in a nice box with a thank you card! Details are everything.The bottle is perfect size- 17 oz. No smell what’s so ever.Will buy from this company again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not only for water
reviews.reviewText: Great to bring in a small purse. Cute and versatile

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slim design fits perfectly in our dog's backpack
reviews.reviewText: We got 2 to fit in the pockets of our dog's backpack. No other water bottles would easily fit. These are tough and so far leak-proof. We have taken several hikes (5 miles+) and the amount of water 2 bottles hold provides enough for our dog. We pour from one bottle and then balance the remaining water between the 2 so the pack rides evenly on our dog's back. Only worry is potentially losing the cap because it isn't attached to the bottle. Very happy with our purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good bottle / Needs a lanyard
reviews.reviewText: Great bottle. I have just started carrying a NutSac bag and it is a perfect fit for the inside pocket. It feels sturdy, doesn’t leak (hasn’t anyway). The one thing it needs is a lanyard otherwise you need to keep track of the lid. I made my own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid , good quality
reviews.reviewText: I love that it has an ml marker. Slides just right in a backpack side pocket. Crystal clear plastic and solid , it will not warp. Matte cap feels good, screw in tight seal.
